settings.name: PeerTube Instances
settings.description: Comma-separated list of PeerTube instance base URLs to use (e.g. https://peertube.example.org,https://another.instance). Edit hereâ€”no reinstall needed.

settings.name: Randomize Instances
settings.description: If enabled, the home feed will sample random instances from the configured list.

settings.name: Instances Sample Size
settings.description: How many instances to sample when building the home feed. (Numeric, default 3)

settings.name: Max videos per channel
settings.description: Maximum number of videos from the same channel in an aggregated feed page (default 2).

settings.name: Preferred Languages
settings.description: Comma-separated language codes to prefer (e.g. en,fr,es). Used client-side (and best-effort server param).

settings.name: Recent Seen Limit
settings.description: Number of recent video IDs to remember to avoid repeats across short sessions.

settings.name: Report Views
settings.description: Report viewing activity to PeerTube instances.
